Articles.Content: I create a new universe where peace is impossible and teleport everyone into it. I throw [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) into a bottomless pit which is everything-resistant. My hill oh, and I edited the file: Spoiler Portal=1 **Edited July 31, 2018 by TeslaPenguin1**

Spoiler

Peace = possible 

bottomlessPits = 0

HillOwnership = The Minmus Derp HansonKerman
Me and [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s hill.
These conjoned twins get splitted. They fight for the hill. Both lost.
We are not conjoined twins and we don't fight. Me and [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s hill.

Yes, you are not conjoined anymore.

But the thread title is "King of the Hill", not "Duumvirate of the Hill" or so.

So, maybe personally you don't fight, but I would not be sure about [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s intentions.

(Probably, he will appear now and try to ensure you that he doesn't have a knife behind).
We are both kings. Me and [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s hill.
Yeah. (plus I'm an apprentice engineer I don't work with sharp things)

You see, [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/), a knife is not that what you must be afraid of.  

He is an apprentice engineer, so check your bathtube twice with an electric tester before sitting there.  

If not intentionally, then just accidentally (as an *apprentice*) he could touch it with a wire.

Spoiler

![Highlander-comic.jpg](http://brutalgamer.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Highlander-comic.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-01T16:50:04Z" title="08/01/2018 04:50  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 1, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">Even if I did that... why?</font>
A rather strange question. To be ***the*** King of the hill. Not ***a***.

Now that peace is possible, I establish a new hill 20 kilometers to the north of [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)‘s and [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/)‘s. I will no longer fight them for their hill, only for mine.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, TeslaPenguin1 said:
> 
> 
> Now that peace is possible, I establish a new hill 20 kilometers to the north of [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)‘s and [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/)‘s. I will no longer fight them for their hill, only for mine.
> 

But by the time you do that, the universe has already undergone it's heat death, causing your hill to be nonexistent.

So, while [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) are competing for the same hill, [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/) starts fighting with them for the mine.

(I even didn't know that there was a mine under hill).
We’re not competing for the same hill. We’re sharing it.

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> We’re not competing for the same hill. We’re sharing it.
> 

Yes, that's how they call it.

I’m just gonna retreat to my blast proof mine...

it has an army of penguins guarding it
Cool! Would you like to become a protectorate of my hill? It has a space elevator. [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)

Yes. My army of penguins and I moves upstairs from the mine and forms a circle formation around the hill, keeping it safe.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-02T10:43:31Z" title="08/02/2018 10:43  AM" data-short="5 yr">August 2, 2018</time> by TeslaPenguin1**
Thank you! want a big house, [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, TeslaPenguin1 said:
> 
> 
> My army of penguins
> 

Noice.

Will they need <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">some ice?</font>
We can set up an ice playground in the lake.

I call in an air strike with b-84 ground penetrating nuclear bombs. My deep crater.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-02T16:24:14Z" title="08/02/2018 04:24  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 2, 2018</time> by Fraston**

The b-84 ground penetrating thingies do not reach the ground because of the circumplanetary shield. Me, [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.
I fix the damage done to cirumplanetary <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">shield. Still our hill.</font>
